summary:
adds buyable Black soulgems at whiterun\'s general store
and alchemical ingredients to arcadia cauldron

version 2
adds more items to General store alchemical ingredients have been placed at windhelm white phial instead I couldnt find arcadias vendor chest so every cupboard in game had the ingredients this is fixed on JmB merchant improved 2
descriptionHtml:
adds a few things for sale at whiteruns general store as well as buyable black soulgems...
more ingredients for sale at arcadia cauldron...
(version 1 has bug due to alchemical ingredient being put at the wrong place youll find them in cupboards all around skyrim)

version 2 (Remake not update)
adds more items to General store alchemical ingredients have been placed at windhelm white phial instead I couldnt find arcadias vendor chest so every cupboard in game had the ingredients this is fixed on JmB merchant improved 2

Items were droped in merchants chest no lvld list touched...!
author: JmB_madmind
